jml.math.abs
Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
  jml.math.abs.Statistics

public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object

Title: Statistics

Description: This class provides methods for calculating statistical information of different objects.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:

Jonatan Gomez

Method Detail

average

public java.lang.Object average(java.lang.Object[] x)
Calculates the average Result object of a given collection of Result objects. All the objects in the argument collection should belong to the same class. In other case the average will be not calculated.

Parameters:
x - A collection of Result objects
Returns:
The average Result object of a given collection of Result objects

stdError

public java.lang.Object stdError(ObjectSource x,
                                 java.lang.Object avg,
                                 int nN)
Calculates the standar error Result object of a given collection of Result objects. All the objects in the argument collection should belong to the same class. In other case the standard deviation will be not calculated.

Parameters:
x - A collection of Result objects
avg - The average statistics of the collection
nN - Lenght of the object
Returns:
The standar error object of a given collection of Result objects
